titocc.compiler.types

Class CType

  • java.lang.Object
    • titocc.compiler.types.CType
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrayType, FunctionType, IntType, InvalidType, PointerType, VoidType

    public abstract class CType
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class for representing types in C type system. Allows testing equality between types and querying their features.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CType()

      Decays an array type into a pointer type.

      Returns the size of the type in chars.

      Returns whether the type is arithmetic (integer or floating point).

      Returns whether the type is an integer type.
      boolean isObject()
      Returns whether the type is an object (i.e.
      boolean isPointer()
      Returns true if the type is a pointer type (including void pointers).
      boolean isScalar()
      Returns whether the type is a scalar type (arithmetic or pointer).
      boolean isValid()
      Returns whether the type is valid.

        public CType()

    • Method Detail

      • isObject

        public boolean isObject()
        Returns whether the type is an object (i.e. not a function or void).
        Returns:
        true if object type

      • isScalar

        public boolean isScalar()
        Returns whether the type is a scalar type (arithmetic or pointer).
        Returns:
        true if scalar type

      • isPointer

        public boolean isPointer()
        Returns true if the type is a pointer type (including void pointers).
        Returns:
        true if pointer type

      • dereference

        public CType dereference()
        Returns type obtained from dereferencing a pointer or array type.
        Returns:
        dereferenced type or an instance of InvalidType if this is not a pointer or array type

      • isArithmetic

        public boolean isArithmetic()
        Returns whether the type is arithmetic (integer or floating point).
        Returns:
        true if arithmetic type

      • isInteger

        public boolean isInteger()
        Returns whether the type is an integer type.
        Returns:
        true if integer type

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns the size of the type in chars. Note that in ttk-91 char is the same as int (i.e. 4 bytes), so sizeof(int) == 1.
        Returns:
        the size in chars or 0 if not an object type

      • getIncrementSize

        public int getIncrementSize()
        Returns the step size when incrementing/decrementing the type using -- ++ + += etc operators. If the type is not incrementable then returns 0.
        Returns:
        increment size or 0 if not incrementable

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Returns whether the type is valid. (i.e. it is not instance of InvalidType).
        Returns:
        true if valid

      • decay

        public CType decay()
        Decays an array type into a pointer type. All other types are unaffected.
        Returns:
        the decayed type
